ServerGroup.Name: The Fun Pimps

Server.Name: Alpha 16.3
Server.Description:
The Fun Pimps' 7 Days to Die Installs a vanilla version of the Fun Pimp's 7 Days to Die for Alpha 16.3
Downloading using the Advanced Mode, and Select Install From Steam.
